thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 7 of 110
thread.title: CONSTANCE

author: CONSTANCE
title: CONSTANCE
text:
I have done this program at home before with other programs
and found them long, drawn out and boring. They also took over 10 hours to complete. This home class was interesting and fast paced. The videos were very informative. I loved the ease in which I could pause the program and go back to it at a later time. If you cannot get out and take a one day class, I would recommend this defensive driving class.
